channel.title: +4 Tai Levels, -1 Nin / Gen Levels
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "+4 Tai Levels, -1 Nin / Gen Levels" - Is there one?

item.title: Re: +4 Tai Levels, -1 Nin / Gen Levels
item.content:encoded:
There is the Sandwich Dispenser
* +5 Stamina per day
* +4 Tai Levels
* -1 Nin Level
* -1 Gen Level
It's found on the quest "Cry Some More" when you've got Tai 21+, Tuesday, Sascha.

item.title: Is there One
item.content:encoded:
There's already

Flamethrower +4 Gen Levels, -1 Nin / Tai Levels
and
Fireworks Launcher +4 Nin Levels, -1 Gen / Tai Levels

so the question is there one or am I just blind?
